mapper.sql: branch_no, cno, branch_name, enabled, update_time, create_time
mapper.select:
select cp.*, CONCAT(c.cname,'---',c.tname) as newsName from branch cp left join news c on cp.cno=c.cno where 1=1
and cp.cno=#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into branch
branch_no,
cno,
branch_name,
enabled,
update_time,
create_time,
#{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update branch
cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where branch_no = #{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update branch set cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} where branch_no = #{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
